attributes.action: Change school starting hours and large vehicle movement hours
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is very noticable that when schools are on half term, congestion in many areas dissapears.  If school start time was changed to 10.am a lot of trafic congestion would be avoided. After all  the government support flexible working hours for parents, Don't they. Also If large vehicles were only permited to be on the roads after 7pm till 5.am again this would have an reduce conjestion.  There are always employees who prefer to work nights.
